H0.text: Name the new French president of 2012. Nicolas Sarkozy

H1.text: Name the new French president of 2012. Marine Le Pen

H2.text: Name the new French president of 2012. Fran√ßois Bayrou

H3.text: Name the new French president of 2012. Hollande

A4.text: In the second round of voting on 6 May 2012, Hollande was elected with 51.6% of the vote.

A5.text: Hollande was inaugurated on 15 May 2012, and shortly afterwards appointed Jean-Marc Ayrault to be his Prime Minister.
